description: Apply historical solar irriadiances from the Solar Spectral Irradiance (SSI) database.  The SSI is a product of the collaboration between the European SOLID (First European  Comprehensive SOLar Irradiance Data exploitation) data analysis project and the US NRLSSI2 model team (NRL and LASP, USA).
name: Historical Solar Spectral Irradiance
keywords: Solar Forcing, Historical, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
